/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -pthread -g   CMakeFiles/demo.dir/src/play.cpp.o CMakeFiles/demo.dir/src/packetqueue.cpp.o CMakeFiles/demo.dir/src/videocode.cpp.o CMakeFiles/demo.dir/src/framequeue.cpp.o  -o demo  -L/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg  -L/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg/libswresample  -L/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg/libavutil  -L/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg/libavcodec  -L/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg/libavformat -lavformat -lavcodec -lavutil -lswresample -lswscale -lSDL2 -lSDL2main -lvdpau -lX11 -lz -lm -lva -lva-drm -lva-x11 -Wl,-rpath,/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg:/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg/libswresample:/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg/libavutil:/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg/libavcodec:/home/newuser/gaoding/FFmpeg/libavformat
